short_summary: General Maintenance Services for RCMP Detachments
description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites proposals to provide general maintenance services for RCMP detachments in Labrador, excluding the Nunatsiavut settlement area.
full_summary:
## Tender Announcement: General Maintenance Services for RCMP in Labrador

### Tender Title:
[English:] General Maintenance Services - Labrador (excluding Nunatsiavut settlement area)
[French:] Services d’entretien général – Labrador (à l’exclusion de la région désignée du Nunatsiavut)

### Tender Number:
[*CB-811-19804562*]

**Funding Government Institution:**
 Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)

**Requesting Entity Address:**
80 Garland Ave, H-066
Dartmouth, Nova Scotia, Canada B3B 0J8

### Notified Contact: 
Sandra Bremner
Phone: (902) 717-5395
Email: sandra.bremner@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

### Opertosibilities:

The RCMP is seeking a contractor to provide general maintenance services for RCMP buildings, residences, and infrastructure in Labrador, excluding the Nunatsiavut settlement area. Services to be provided include.

* Heating and ventilation and air circulation systems
* Plumbing system maintenance or repair
* Electrical services
* Renovation of buildings, landmarks or monuments
* Residential building construction services
* Single family dwelling construction services
* Multiple unit dwelling construction services
* Non-residential building construction services
* Commercial and office building construction services
* Commercial and office building renovation and repair services

### Number of Offers: 
None as this is a Request for Standing Offer (RSO)

### Evaluation Criteria: 
An evaluation of potential contractors is required and the successful contractor will be chosen based on minimal criteria. Evaluation is based on lowest bidder, fulfilling technical criteria.

### Significant Downloads:
You can find all files and papers on the website CanadaBids.ca

### Sharing and Finding Past Docs is not No-Required:
